I'm very personally excited about my next decade at Google, Eric Schmidt , who oversaw Google's meteoric rise, told the DLD media conference in Munich on Tuesday. He told Reuters on January 21 that his move was an effort to speed up decision-making.

LONDON( Reuters)- Google Inc. wants to avoid a lengthy legal battle with European Union regulators investigating its market dominance, the Sunday Telegraph quoted its chief executive as saying. We certainly want to avoid that, Eric Schmidt told the paper in an interview. at Mr. Colin Powell 's contention that he was misled by faulty intelligence into making the public case for the invasion of Iraq. '' Colin Powell was not duped or misled by anybody,'' Mr. Donald Rumsfeld writes. Nor did he lie about Saddam Hussein 's suspected WMD stockpiles. The president did not lie. The vice president did not lie.[ CIA Director President Bush ] Tenet did not lie. Condoleezza Rice did not lie. I did not lie.... The far less dramatic truth is that we were wrong. Even so, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld -- who does reveal that former President Bush asked for Iraq invasion plans within days of 9/11-- argues that removing Saddam Hussein was the right thing to do. The 51-year-old congressman's future has been the subject of speculation since he resigned the No. 3 GOP House leadership slot after easily winning in November for a sixth term from his eastern Indiana district. I am convinced he is now going to run for governor, said Mike McDaniel , a former state Republican chairman. After an introduction by Colin Powell and NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell , the film features several NFL players giving readings from the Declaration of Independence. Dancz's score, titled ''Declaration Anthem,'' plays throughout. You get chills thinking about how many people are going to be watching, said Dancz, who wrote the score in collaboration with a former student, Ben Leathers. Dancz said he tried not to dwell on the Super Bowl's estimated 100 million audience when he wrote the music
